activities: Higher Logic, LLC provides a white-labeled, social networking and collaboration platform for organizations to offer their respective constituents (members, customers, users etc). It is similar to a private version of LinkedIn, except that it integrates directly into the organization's database and is able to leverage their data to allow members of the organization to build networks and collaborate with each other.  Higher Logic, LLC itself does not collect personal data, our clients typically collect data (e.g., members who have joined their organization) and Higher Logic, LLC then provides a software service that allows the organization to provide greater member value to their organization.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We have engaged TRUSTe to provide independent dispute resolution services
